description:
Ever think to yourself, "I'd be a great career coach!" If so, then this course is for you!

Top-ranked career coach, J.T. O'Donnell explains exactly what it takes to become a six-figure career coach. As a world-renown career coach with over 1.2 MILLION followers on LinkedIn, O'Donnell has coached thousands of professionals. And now, she's going to share with you exactly how she did it.

Highlights include:

  • Why career coaching is about to explode.
  • Why most 'freelance' career coaches fail.
  • What 5 things you need to make career coaching your full-time job.
  • How to make sure you choose the right niche so you can build your coaching practice faster.
  • Tips for creating a sustainable career coaching business.
  • And, a  whole lot more!

The course will take you less than 2 hours to complete. By the time you're done, you'll have a thorough understanding of the steps you'll need to take to get started on building your career coaching business.

Get started today and learn how you can become a successful career coach!
title: How To Become A 6-Figure Career Coach
